title: Multi-tenant organization capabilities
description: Multi-tenant organization (MTO) capabilities - now available in Microsoft Entra and Microsoft 365. MTO simplifies the process for organizations to arrange tenants as secure, autonomous entities connected by common policies and foundational services. MTO provides new streamlined collaboration across tenants, new ways for employees and leaders to connect using Viva Engage, manage incidents across tenants with Microsoft Defender XDR, and simplified multi-tenant management in Microsoft Entra.
